title: Pixel 3 Marvelous Marble Wallpaper using incorrect location
content:
I recently got a Pixel 3 and was trying out different wallpapers when I noticed that the live wallpapers which is based on location shows the wrong location for me.

I am based in Europe and the Marvelous Marble Wallpaper is showing US instead of Europe. All other wallpapers that are based on day/night schedule is also wrong since the location seems to be based in the US.

I still have my Pixel 2 and that shows the Marvelous Marble correctly over Europe.

The phones are setup more or less the same. I have checked a lot of settings to make sure they are the same.
Maybe the location for Live Wallpapers are hidden somewhere. Does anyone know?

Thanks!
